RAD_DATASOURCES.DEFAULT_WHERE: LIMIT_TYPE like decode((SELECT LIMIT_TYPE FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.LIMIT_TYPE = B.limit_type), 'AL', '%', (SELECT LIMIT_TYPE FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.LIMIT_TYPE = B.limit_type)) AND PRODUCT like decode((SELECT PRODUCT FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE B.PRODUCT = LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.product), 'ALL', '%', (SELECT product FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.PRODUCT = B.PRODUCT)) AND CCY_CODE like decode((SELECT CCY_CODE FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.CCY_CODE = B.ccy_code), 'ALL', '%', (SELECT CCY_CODE FROM LBVW_BORR_SUBLIMIT B WHERE LBVW_BORR_PROD_VDUTIL.CCY_CODE = B.ccy_code))

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT DISTINCT CONTRACT_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO IN (SELECT TRANCHE_REF_NO FROM LBVWS_BORR_SUBLIMIT)
SELECT distinct A.counterparty,A.CUST_NAME FROM LBVW_BORR_PROD_LIMIT_SUMMARY A ORDER BY A.counterparty
